FAIL_TO_PASS: when set sortOptions then options are sorted within groups
when option.hideHelp(true) then option not included in helpInformation
when program has subcommands then has automatic help command
when command sets hidden then not displayed in helpInformation
when add two options then help contains group with two options
when option.hideHelp() then option not included in helpInformation
when set sortCommands then commands are sorted within groups
when addCommand with hidden:true then not displayed in helpInformation
when add no visible options with heading then heading does not appear
when command sets deprecated noHelp then not displayed in helpInformation
when add no visible command with heading then heading does not appear
when add two commands then help contains group with two commands
end-to-end: when option description is preformatted then manual format is preserved
when add two options with helpGroup then help contains group
when call helpInformation for program then help format is as expected (usage, options, commands)
when add two commands with helpGroup then help contains group
